snippet.title: Little Goody Two Shoes | Announcement Reveal | Square Enix Collective | [ESRB] EN
snippet.description:
Little Goody Two Shoes is a horror narrative adventure game that takes you on a fairy tale journey where all your choices matter to stay alive. 

Play as Elise, a cunning and ambitious lass who dreams of becoming filthy rich. One day, Elise discovers a pair of beautiful shiny red shoes buried in her backyard.
Bewitched, Elise embarks on a fearful journey that pulls her closer and closer into the heart of the mysterious Woods!
Will Elise risk it all for the sake of a dream, or settle for her humble day-to-day life? The
ending of this tale is yours to write…

Little Goody Two Shoes is coming soon to all latest platforms: Steam, Xbox X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PlayStation 5. 

Follow our Twitter for our most enchanting content: https://twitter.com/AstralShiftPro

Join the conversation on our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/TsKx5N6jvU

Get delighted by our Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/astralshiftpro/
#littlegoodietwoshoes #spooky #gaming #xbox #pc #playstation #switch #pixels

###
Don't forget to like this video and subscribe to Square Enix Collective on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/squareenixcollective

Follow Square Enix Collective
***On Twitter: twitter.com/SQEXCollective 
***On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/sqexcollective
***On Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SquareEnixCollective

Square Enix Collective® is a London-based division of Square Enix LTD., providing publishing services to indie developers around the world.
We're always on the look-out for great new projects and talented teams worldwide.
To learn more about Square Enix Collective head to our website at:
https://collective.square-enix-games.com/
